title: Karth Ult bug on URF
body:
Playing a game of URF just then. Ult had stupid low cooldown like normal, was casting like it should. Then for some reason it bugged and defaulted to the normal 180 something second cooldown. The info still showed up it should have been a 34 second cooldown, but it remained the same.

The event leading up to it was: enemy Zed ulted, me glassing mid his ult, come out of glass and dying, casting ult during passive.

replies.body:
Sorry I don't usually report bugs. So OCE players report bugs on the NA server?

Also I gave as best a description I could. Kind of hard to get the circumstances to happen naturally again.

I know it's weird, but that's what the guidelines say to do, and **God forbid you disobey the guidelines.**

Also, for future reference, if you don't use "Reply" to reply to someone, they won't know that you replied to them.

>**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.

Also, you'll need information on how to replicate the bug. Since it's a featured game-mode, though, it's probably not gonna be touched.
